name: CellBox
description: A simple Prototype Sandbox Game Give me ideas for cells in the comments and if they are possible, I will make them. QNA: Will the game receive frequent updates? A: no, it will not I am taking a break from the game development industry but Polls for ideas will be available by august 2nd so look out Q: will mods be available soon? A: I can't give a definite answer for this one the game engine does not say if mods work or not Q: Are there any updates with the new build? A: Yes, Find out also try Konami code
